cards.description: 0-8 resource cards (flexible count, optional). Each card requires {.resource} marker on H3 heading (e.g., '### Resource Title {.resource}'). Use 1-3 for minimal examples, 4-5 for standard collections, 6-8 for comprehensive resource lists. Section hidden if no cards.

title.description: Resource title captured from H3 heading text before {.resource} marker

badge.description: Badge label from **Badge:** pattern (uppercase, e.g., DOCS, CODE, DATA, BOOK, PAPER, GUIDE, ARTICLE, TUTORIAL, REFERENCE)

body.description: Resource description from paragraph after metadata
